about: I come from a background of New Product Development, design and illustration.  Free of any particular style, I enjoy to create powerful aesthetics that form a world of their own.

reviews: ['BankSea was phenomenal! Fast work and very quick to respond. ', 'Amazing designer!\r\rWas very patient and threw up many different options. Cannot recommend highly enough', 'Hi AlexNo worries at all and it is a pleasure to work on your label project.  I am currently based in the Cape Winelands, South Africa (but bounce between here and Bordeaux, France).  I have close family that lives in Australia too :-)  My email address is:kelly@breede.co.zaI work internationally so time differences are something that I am well used to and adapt accordingly.  I too would welcome working with you in the future, please do get in touch when you require my services.  On the current Roseville project, please email me if you have any questions or if your printer has any questions, I would also like to look at the proof that the printer draws up before going to print so that I can make 100% sure that everything is perfect before they do the print run.  I would also like to do your back label, so when you are ready, please email me (to the above address) with the information and I can do the artwork.I thoroughly enjoyed the project!Kind RegardsKelly (BankSea)', 'This designer was patient and worked with me helping me create exactly what I didn’t know I was looking for!! ', 'Once again, Bank Sea did a great job.', 'It has been a pleasure working with BankSea. Extremely professional! I highly recommend him!', 'The design was spot on from the start. I would strongly recommend her and contact her again for future demands!!!', 'easy and prompt.', "Immaculate. Squirrell's design is everything I didn't know I wanted. about: I would love to work 1-on-1 with you to create the perfect design to fit your company! Feel free to get in touch with me and ask any questions. I will work diligently to make a logo exactly what you want. Your satisfaction is very important to me!

about: Hi! My name is Anastasia , I am a russian illustrator and graphic designer based in Krasnoyarsk - heart of Siberia. My illustrations are bright, friendly and I'm specializing in figurative (humans and animals, things) representations. I can also work vector based. I love to draw and experiment with style and strong colors. I would love to create beautiful things for You too. Contact me at any time to ask questions or discuss your project.

about:
Hello! I am an inspired artist and graphic designer from St.Petersburg with over 7 years of experience. I create clean user interface designs, digital illustrations, logos and brand identity.
  If you are looking for a simple and creative design that solves the problems of your business, please welcome in 1-to-1 projects!

about:
I'm Andrea Rubio, a designer based in Madrid.
  I'm graduated in Integral design, what means that I have skills in graphic, interior and product design. I'm focused on branding, logo design and editorial, with a huge interest in photography. I like to implement a bit of my style as a designer in every work I do.

I am a graphic designer who loves sketching and digital art. Sketching is essential to any creative process as it allows me to improve my design and get new ideas.
  I maintain each project as a brand new experience and listen to my client’s ideas and needs.
  Nature and different cultures inspire me, and I enjoy discovering new paths and experiences.
  I specialize in logo, branding, illustration, and web design.

about:
I am Dev. a graphic designer from India. Working as a freelancer graphic designer since 5-7 years. Before starting anything I take time and care to understand the core objectives of your business and what the design is meant to help you achieve. I do this simply to make sure that the design  matches closely with the goals and objectives of your business.
  Check out my work and don't forget to INVITE ME.

about:
Hello, I'm Muhammad Hafif Fuadi.
  I am an imaginative and avid graphic designer with over 8 years of experience, exceptional attention to detail and a passion for completing projects on time.
  Have a solid understanding of vector art and effective logo design language, which enables fast delivery of clean logo designs.
  Mainly, I like working on gradient logo projects.
  If you are willing to cooperate with us, we are very willing.

about: I'm an Interior Architecture student at the University of Indonesia, but also a self-taught digital illustrator. To me, the most important thing in illustration is the message it tries to convey. I see design as a problem solver, and illustration is a tool to help designs achieve their goals. It's not about how fancy it looks. To me, when the message is understood without needing further explanation, it's an illustration that works

about:

  I combine eye-catching hand drawn vector illustrations alongside strong graphics for Logos, Corp id, Posters, Flyers, Brochures & Packaging design.
  Please get in touch if you like my style, I love working with clients that give constructive feedback, good communication is the key. Thanks

Soy un apasionado del diseño gráfico desde que, en el año 1999, decidí establecerme como freelance.
  Aún recuerdo mis primeros pasos diseñando carteles y camisetas.
  Esto me permitió participar como diseñador gráfico en agencias de publicidad.
  Decido focalizar mi creatividad en el diseño editorial, a raíz de una colaboración con varios escritores a principios de 2017.
  Me encanta la literatura y la creación gráfica, aunar las dos cosas me permite dedicarme a lo que más me gusta.
tags: ['Entry Level']

about: I have been a designer for 8 years, initially I stood out in areas such as print creation, WordPress pages, animation. When I went out to work I began to work in an NGO for 3 years, in that I was in charge of doing branding, make printed material. Then I went to work with several international design studios for 4 years where I worked as an Art Director, this led me to fall more in love with branding and illustration, currently I am working only as a freelance.
